mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select * from (select match_user_id,count(1) as count from busi_customer WHERE (follow_next_date IS NULL OR follow_next_date < now()) and project_id =1 and status = 1 group by match_user_id )as a left join sys_user on(sys_user.user_id=match_user_id)
